welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Borgerhout, Belgium! Get ready to experience the warm and charming atmosphere of this vibrant city, known for its historical architecture and lively cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Borgerhout has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport is used for transporting goods and freight.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Dedicated to domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves as a hub for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
